about_the_game:
In "Obsolete Souls™ Episode 0: Operation Haiti" players can use the various combat mechanics at their disposal to smash the opposition! The player’s objective is to generate a high score by chaining together different attacks to create combos.

STANDARD ATTACKS: These actions are able to be performed at any time, and are the basis for attacking enemies in the game. These attacks can be chained together and canceled out of each other to perform various combos.

RUSH ATTACKS: Rush attacks deal significant damage in a short burst of attacks. The Rush meter is filled by performing combos with standard attacks. When the meter is full various attacks become stronger, and new combos become available to the player.

GAMIA ATTACKS: Gamia attacks are special moves that deal large amounts of damage to a wide range of enemies, restore player health, and generate the most score. These attacks are necessary for achieving the highest rank.

Use the standard attacks to fill the “Rush” meter, and then the Rush attacks to fill the “Gamia” meter. Maintaining a high combo count, and accessing Gamia when applicable will be critical to mastering combat in Episode 0!

AYISYEN CREOLE:
Nan "Obsolete Souls™ Epizod 0: Operasyon Ayiti" jwè yo ka sèvi ak divès kalite mekanik konba ki disponib pou kraze opozisyon an! Objektif jwè a se jenere yon
nòt segondè nan chenn ansanm diferan atak pou kreye konbo.

ATAK ESTANDA - Aksyon sa yo kapab fèt nenpòt ki lè, epi yo se baz pou atake lènmi nan jwèt la. Atak sa yo ka chenn ansanm ak anile youn ak lòt pou fè plizyè
konbo.

ATAK RUSH - Atak Rush fè gwo domaj nan yon kout pete atak. Se mèt Rush la ranpli pa fè konbo ak atak estanda. Lè mèt la plen, divès kalite atak vin pi fò, ak
nouvo konbo vin disponib pou jwè a. Mèt Rush la ranpli le jwè a fè konbo ak atak estanda. Lè mèt la plen, divès kalite atak vin pi fò, ak nouvo konbo vin disponib pou jwè a.

ATAK GAMIA - Atak Gamia yo se mouvman espesyal ki fè gwo kantite domaj nan yon pakèt lènmi, retabli sante jwè, ak jenere plis nòt. Atak sa yo nesesè pou reyalize ran ki pi wo a.

Sèvi ak atak estanda yo pou ranpli "Rush" mèt la, le ou fini, itilize, Rush atak yo pou ou ranpli "Gamia" mèt la. Yon gwo kantite konbo ak Gamia pral kritik pou metrize konba nan epizod 0!

Goumen kont wa Khard ak volonte l nan aksyon sa a ki se yon prequel nan Obsolete Souls™ RPG la!
